name: HeartBreak (HiStudioGames)
description:
Hello there if your here you have found your game! well anyway lets get to it! Heartbreak is a visual-novel. made by me and my sister this is the short demo "which is free." the full demo plus full game will be out! the full game will cost 0.99$ and is on all pc platforms like windows, mac, and Linux. "Disclaimer the game is in early development it may and does have issues! like glitches, and some bugs, but we are trying our best to make our game as playable as possible!"

-HiStudioGames
